_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
an3.70:2.1+an3.70:40.4^where_else_mentio: Aṅga, Magadha, Kāsī, Kosala, Vajjī, Malla, Ceti, Vaṅga, Kuru, Pañcāla, Maccha, Sūrusena, Assaka, Avanti, Gandhāra, Kamboja
before^an3.70:3.11^where: Sāvatthī in the Eastern Monastery, the stilt longhouse of Migāra's mother
where: Sāvatthī in the Eastern Monastery, the stilt longhouse of Migāra's mother
